data.title: [translation+lyrics] Holy Fragments by Pratanallis
data.meta_description: [translation+lyrics] Holy Fragments by Pratanallis This time we’ll go over this 2018 album by Pratanallis. It’s about like, angels, and dreams, idk, mostly picked it up because Justynusty is an...
data.text:
This time we’ll go over this 2018 album by Pratanallis. It’s about like, angels, and dreams, idk, mostly picked it up because Justynusty is an insanely cool song with a funny name for contrast. Most of the album does match up to it though, so overall a pretty good release, plus it is completely available on youtube, how convenient that more artists are getting these topic channels. Lyrics down below and see you all next time.

———————————————————–

(Edit: Click here for a really cool write-up on the album in case you don’t quite get it, it’s a nice read!)

Composer for the whole album: HINODE

Menina Eris

vocals: めらみぽっぷ

yume wo miteiru naiteru shoujo

waratte kowareteta kokoro ni wa

nanimo omoi dasezu utsumuite

mou kao wo agete mo ii no desu ka?

a girl crying in a dream

her laughter shattered along with her heart

saddened by every thought she has

would you please raise your head again?

An angel came down from the sky

masshiro na tsubasa wa

yasashiku dakishimete ikiru sube wo

atatakai warai koe kikasete

namida ga kobore ochite asu he

an angel came down from the sky

with her pure-white wings

and their gentle embrace full of life

Upon hearing her gentle laugh

she cried and decided to live onto tomorrow

nanimo mienai moumoku na shoujo

kioku no tobira mo mienakute

tachiagari arukou

kaeritai kasuka na kioku he to tadoru michi wo

the blinded girl who can’t see anything

not even through the door to her memories

stood up and walked

guided towards the past memories she longs for

An angel came down from the sky

shikkoku no tsubasa wa

obiete jama suru mono kowashite iku

kanashimi to fuan no Silhouette

oitsumerareru mae ni nigete

an angel came down from the sky

her pure-black wings

tore apart all scary obstacles

as the silhouette of sadness and doubt

chased after her

kono saki ni wa kowai oni ga iru

chichi mo haha mo mura no hito mo

kocchi wo mite inotteru

watashi sou kono mama

(The sacrificed girl closed memory)

there’s a fearsome demon ahead

my father, mother and even the villagers…

I pray for you to look over us

if I go on like this…

erabareta shoujo ni

tenshi ga mai oriru

nakushita kioku nanoka yume deshou ka?

sugu soba ni iru kimi ni kiite mo oshiete kurenai kedo

towards the chosen girl

the angel descended upon

what did you wish for in those lost memories?

I couldn’t tell you even if you stayed by my side

An angel came down from the sky

futari tabi no tochuu nakushita kioku no kagi sagasu tame

hitori de wa susumenai keredo kimi ga iru kara yukou

An angel came down from the sky

The two embark on a journey to unlock those memories

Unable to move on alone, but marching onwards together

(Who subdued a monster? Who saved sacrificed girl)

mou hitori no tenshi ni kitsukazu ni mada shirazu ni

The lone angel had yet to realize, she still didn’t know

Deja vu

vocals: eupe

kore ga kimerareta unmei demo

saigo made aragatte ikiru

moumoku no shoujo enjimasu

deki sugita guuzen

even though this fate may already be sealed

I’ll keep fighting it as long as I live

playing the part of a blinded girl

I’m surprisingly good at it

hajimete no soto no sekai “Dejavu”

furi kakaru hiai wa marude kata shigure

I feel a dejavu seeing the outside world

the grief sprinkled throughout it was like a drizzle

akui wa iranai iranai mata kurikaesu

hitan no sora wa meiro no you

mada mienai mienai deguchi sagashite

saa futari de asu he no tobira mezasu

I’ve no need for malice, none of it, not again

this sorrowful sky resembles a labyrinth

I can’t see it, I can’t, the exit that I’m looking for

Let’s search together for the door towards tomorrow

shoujo no nakigara wo daite negau maki modoru jikan

sore wa yume to nari mezamereba

I pray for time to turn back as I hold the husk of that girl

for her to awaken from this dream

shoujo wa shiranai shiranai hitan no sora wo

mezame wa tenshi no yurikago de

yura yurarete yurareta susumu tabiji wa

sono sentaku wa michibikareru mama ni

the girl doesn’t know, not at all

the skies of grief are but a cage for angels

going on in this shakey journey

guided by that decision

terasareta michi wo aruku tabi ni

tenshi wa kurikaeshi kurai michi wo

walking along this enlightened path

as the angel traverses through the darkened path

shoujo ga waraeru sonna hibi wo

those days in which the girl laughed

shoujo no mirai wo mirai he tsunageru tame ni

subete no guuzen wo hitsuzen ni shite

for the sake of letting the girl meet her future

all of it was necessary

akui wa iranai iranai mata kurikaesu

hitan no sora wa meiro no you

mada mienai mienai deguchi sagashite

watashi wa subete wo ushinatte mo aragau unmei

I’ve no need for malice, none of it, not again

this sorrowful sky resembles a labyrinth

I can’t see it, I can’t, the exit I’m looking for

from my struggle, to prevent fate taking everything away from me

maki modoru jikan asu he no michi

tenshi wa kurikaesu kurai michi wo

yume wo owaranai

tabi wa tsutsuku

rewinding time to preserve the path to tomorrow

the angel traverses through the darkened path

so that this dream won’t end

the journey goes on

Braking Down

Vocals: きょーこ

yami wo terashita hoshizora no yoru yo

kagayaki wa kahogo sugite

ikusen no toki

kurikaeshite moetsuki hate

the starlit sky illuminates this dark night

it’s brightness exudes calmness

for thousands of times

it’s stars will burn up over and over again

itsushika mahou ga tokereba

yume ni toketeiku karetsu na genjitsu no saki ni

Dead Night tsuki wo miagereba

doko ni mo mienai sekai mo tokete yuku

if some day this magic were to be undone

a harsh reality would await at the end of this dream

if you looked at the moon in a dead night

you’d see nothing as the world itself melts away

shoujo yo susume yo Already Over Road

fumihazu shitara Lose Everything

utakata no yume

nani koko daku ware ga toi wataru

the girl’s already gone over the road

but if she misses her step she’ll lose everything

it is but a fleeting dream

so why hold on to it

itsushika mahou ga tokereba

yume wa himo tokare terasareta michi wo ushinau

Dead Night tsuki wo sagashitemo

doko ni mo nai you na sekai de (Now let’s break it)

if some day this magic were to be undone

this dream would unravel and she’d stray from the bright path

if you searched for the moon on a dead night

you’d only find a world were nothing can be seen

kono sekai no Etranger tsuki ga nai nara hi tomoshite

tachi fusagaru mono wo unmei wo moyashi tsukushi

nozomu sono kotae wa Her Happiness hitan no sora nara mou iranai

kuroi tsubasa wo hiroge kaware kanashii shoujo no tame ni

Until dawn. Instead of Moonlight

but a stranger to this world could light a fire if there were no moon

extinguishing the fate of those who’d stand in their path

since I wish for her happiness I have no need for the skies of grief

I’ll spread these black wings to turn around her sorrow

mou mahou ga tokete mo

sono yume no tsutsuki kimi to irekawari miseru yo

Dead Night tsuki ga nai yoru ni

atarashii mahou de sekai wo (Now Let’s Break it)

and so the magic has worn off

but I’ll show you that the dream can keep going

in this dead night with no moon

a brand new magic will be born in this world

kono sekai no Etranger tsuki ga nai nara hi tomoshite

tachi fusagaru mono wo unmei wo moyashi tsukushi

nozomu sono kotae wa Her Happiness hitan no sora nara mou iranai

kuroi tsubasa hiroge kawaro nozome Breaking Dawn

but a stranger to this world could light a fire if there were no moon

extinguishing the fate of those who’d stand in their path

since I wish for her happiness I have no need for the skies of grief

I’ll spread these black wings to reach the breaking dawn She desired

“White wings” believed in their own justice. The end of that future

“Black wings” don’t want to let the girl die

So I broke nasty world. She hasn’t known anything

Compassion

Vocals: きょーこ

tamasaka todoita sono inori ni haruka na sora yori kitaru tenshi

sukui no te wo kimagure ni mo sashi nobeta mama It’s My Thing

rarely do prayers reach the angels beyond the distant sky

so I reached out a helping hand, that’s my thing

kowasareru mura de negau muku na shoujo mitsuketa

tenshi wa maiorite wa tou You… kiseki to no hikikae ni

I found an innocent girl praying from a destroyed village

and so I asked you… what would you exchange for a miracle

kegarenaki sono hitomi utsusu keshiki wa junshoku

sasagete yo sono me to daisetsuna kioku wo

in her pure eyes a vivid landscape was reflected

offer them to me, your eyes and precious memories

setsunaru negai wa kanaerareta shoujo no sekai wa katsute no mama

me wo samaseba nanimo shiranu sono hitomi wa kurai mama

yasashii koe wo kikase kokoro wa marude ningyou no you

kurayami no naka sashi noberareta sono te ga terasu Faint Moonlight

if her earnest wish were to be granted, her world would be no more

even if she opened her darkened eyes, she’d recognize nothing

even if she heard a kind voice, her heart would remain like a doll’s

amidst the darkness she reaches out her hand illuminated by faint moonlight

asu ga nai shoujo no jihi kawaru mirai egakou

tenshi dakishimete mata tou okoru renbin no jou de

the mercy of the girl with no tomorrow paints a different future

the angel she holds on to asks again, with a piteous expression

negai wa kanaerareta shoujo wa shiranai katsute no yume

te wo tsunageba ayumi dashita kore wa tenshi no tawamure

shoujo wo kawaii gatta kitsukeba itoshii kokoro mo ari

mahou kakete yume wo misete itsu no hi ka

were the wish to be granted, she would never know

to hold her hand and walk together is the angel’s whim

upon holding her she found out she also had a loving heart

she cast that magic to show her that dream someday

hiai no sora kara sukou It’s My Thing

a salvation from the skies is my thing

Justynusty

Vocals: 黒崎朔夜

hikari ga sora kara sashikomu

zennaru kokoro ni uketome

itsukushimu kono sekai subete ni

kono te sashi nobereba

light shines from the sky

upon all the righteous hearts

as if lending a hand

to this beloved world

fukai no yami wa azawarai

anata no uso ni mamireteru

sono te wa yogoreteru subete wo

kizutsuke kowasu deshou

a deep darkness laughs scornfully

tainted by your deceit

and it’s reach corrupts everything

it is out to tear it all apart

hi ga noboreba kage to nari

hikari wa yami wo umidasu koto ni kitsukanai sekai de

otagai wo misageta

aiirenai kankei ni

the rising sun turns to darkness

in a world unaware that darkness is born from light

despite them scorning each other

being completely incompatible

yami wo keshisarou to maiorita

shiroi tsubasa hiroge

oozora wo furuwasu utagoe

shukufuku no hikari no ame ga fureba

hikari wo kurau bakemono umidashi

daichi wo yami ni okashita

kuroi tsubasa hirogete sora wo mezashita

tenshitachi wa tatakai au

Do You Know Good From Evil?

vanquishing the darkness as they flutter

the white wings spread out

with a singing voice that makes the skies tremble

and raining down a light of bliss

as the beast that consumes the light is born

spreading it’s black wings to reach for the sky

where the angels will fight each other

do you know good from evil?

hikari wa mirai shinjite

yami wa ima wo utagatta

shoujo no kokoro wo utsushite

negai mo omoi sae onaji tenshi dato iu no ni

the light trusts in the future

while the darkness doubts even the present

as the girl’s heart reflects

these same wishes and thoughts of the angels

yami wo keshisarou to maiorita

shiroi tsubasa hiroge

oozora wo furuwasu utagoe

shukufuku no hikari no ame ga fureba

hikari wo kurau bakemono umidashi

daichi wo yami ni okashita

kuroi tsubasa hirogete sora wo mezashita

tenshitachi no owaranu tatakai Justynusty

vanquishing the darkness as they flutter

the white wings spread out

with a singing voice that makes the skies tremble

raining down a light of bliss

as the beast that consumes the light is born

engulfing the land in darkness

spreading it’s black wings to reach for the sky

where the angel’s fight still rages on, Justynusty

With you

vocals: eupe

You take me with you from here

Pass the many wonderful world

Our journey continues

to the end of the world

saa tabi no hajimari atarashii subete ga

aa konna ni suteki kirakira kagayaku

nigiyaka na basho kore dake hito ga iru nante sekai wa hiroi

now let’s begin our journey where everything is new

ah, what wonderful and glittering radiance

what a vivid place, such a big world with anything but people

tori no you ni hane ga areba sora wo tonde

machi ya mori wo koe (dokomademo yukeru)

ah mukashi no yume wo ima wa genjitsu ni mada yume wa tsutsuku

leaping into the sky like a bird

going over forests and towns (going anywhere)

ah, those dreams of the past are now an ongoing reality

mou machi mo shizumari onaji futon no naka

te wo tsunagi nemuru neru no wo oshinde

koko ga dokodemo itsumo tonari ni irunara kitto waraeru

even the towns are quiet, and within the same bed

we sleep holding hands together, loving while still asleep

we could be anywhere, as long as you’re here I’ll be happy

michi wa haruka ni tooi mirai wo mezashite

donna kabe sae mo (norikoete yukeru)

ah, mukashi no yume wo ima wa genjitsu ni mada yume wa tsutsuku

this road leads to our distant future

above any obstacles (we’ll overcome them)

ah, those dreams of the past are now an ongoing reality

itsushika yume wa mezameru to iwareteru kedo mezame wa tooi

someday we’ll wake up from this dream, but that awakening is still far away

itsumo…

itsumo futari de aruite yuku kono tabi wa

sukoshi fushizen ni (sora harete itemo)

ah mukashi no yume wo ima wa genjitsu ni mada yume wa tsutsuku

always…

we’ll always be together walking down this path

even if we don’t belong (the sky will clear up)

ah, those dreams of the past are now an ongoing reality

itsukara ka kishikan wo kanjiru hibi ni

dokoka de betsu no kimi ga ite

「moshikashite kimi wa mou hitori iru no desuka?」

mune ni shimai komi

in those days where I feel a dejavu

like there’s another you somewhere

“Could it be there’s more than one of you?”

I keep those words to myself

yakusoku wo kawashita itsumademo issho da yo

nani ga okorou tomo wasurenai

we exchanged a promise, now we’ll always be together

don’t forget that, no matter what

少女 no Seraph (Shoujo no Seraph, The Seraph Maiden)

Vocals: 黒崎朔夜

saa youka me no tenshi yo

kuroku somaru tsubasa habataite

fukai yami sura daite

jihi ataeshi shoujo no Seraph

now, angel of the eight day

time to flap those black-stained wings

embrace the deep darkness

grant us benevolence, Seraph Maiden

mou kizutsuita tsubasa ni

sono yakume no owari tsutae you

hanamuke ni chiribamete kono sekai no yume ga owaru

with those already scarred wings

she’ll carry out her role to the end

to put an end to this world’s dreams with her parting shot

tooi yakusoku haruka na kioku

sore ga eien wo nozondeiru kara

shuumatsu no rappa utau

arata na sekai wa sugu soko ni aru to

a distant promise, a far away memory

that’s her eternal wish

singing on that final lap

for the new world that’s about to begin

adeyaka ni hoshi wa kirameki

nanoka me no yoru wo irodoru

saigo no yoru ni yurusou

tanatosu mitai ni

the stars glitter with such charm

coloring the night throughout the week

making way for the last night

like Thanatos

kimi no unmei wo nomikomu

akatsuki yamiyo wa shisushizu

shinuru hoshikuzu no hate ni

aoku toumei na sora nozomu

eating up fate

the moonless dawn is so silent

as the stardust dies off

it yearns for the transparent blue sky

fureta setsuna kieru hikari

sonna hakanai kimi ga urayamashii

the light fades as it caresses the moment

I envy how it’s so fleeting

sora ni hikariare to hi nobori

light fills the sky as the sun rises

shoujo no Seraph asayake no umi de

atarashii sekai wo egaku

jibun no ibasho ga doko ni mo nai soredemo

the seraph maiden in the sea of sunset

paints a whole new world

without a place to call her own, even so

shoujo no Seraph tooi yakusoku wa

owaranai yume no tsutsuki wo

yami kurai yami ni toketeku

hikari are yo shoujo wo terase yo

the seraph maiden’s distant promise

the continuation of a never-ending dream

eating away the darkness and melting it apart

let there be light as she shines

Holy Fragments

Vocals: つゆり花鈴, eupe

me ga samete kieta kimi wa marude sekai kara

koboreyuku kokoro hakanai yume no you ni

Woke up and it’s like you’re gone from this world

my heart feels like it was all dream

(Tears won’t stop) poketto no kakera ni kitsuita toki

(Tears won’t stop) moshikashite mada yume no tsutsuki nara

tears won’t stop as I notice all that time was in a pocketed fragment

tears won’t stop, but could the dream still go on

mou ichido Dreamin’

ikutsumono sekai megutta Important Treasure

owaranai Journey

kimi wo mukae ni yukou kondo wa To Start Again

so I’ll keep dreaming

going through countless worlds for my dearest treasure

it’s an endless journey

but I’ll always start it again if it’s to get you back

usotsuite ita no shiranai furi wo shiteita

kowashitaku nakute tada sore dake datta

I lied to myself pretending not to know

I just didn’t want to break it all apart

(Left Me Behind) hikariare sekai ga terasarete mo

(Left Me Behind) kimi no kao sugata sae shiranai

even if a light shines onto this world

it’ll never know of your face or shape

keredo mo Dreamin’

kimitachi ga kureta sekai ga Earthly Paradise

daisuki na Angel

kimi wo mukae ni yukou yakusoku To Start Again

even so I’ll keep dreaming

because the world you granted me was an earthly paradise

my beloved angel

I promise to start again until I find you

I Remember poketto no kakera wo nigiri shimete

I Remember arigatou shinjiteru itsumo

I’ll take a hold of that pocketed space

thank you, I’ll always believe in you

owaranu Dreamin’

kondo wa kimi ni watashi kara Give All Of Oneself

matteite Angel kimi wo osae ni ikou

soushitara To Start Again

endlessly dreaming

I’ll give all of myself to you this time

wait for me angel,

to bring you back I’ll start again and again

me ga samete kimi no nukumori wo kanjita mama

madoromi no naka de yasashiku mitsumeteiru

upon waking up I can still feel your warmth

I finally found kindness even if it was a dream

My Happiness

vocals: めらみぽっぷ

tooi sekai daremo ga akogareteita

yume keshiki ga hirogatteiru to

yumemiru koe mujaki na waraigoe

kikoetara nandomo souzou shiteta

a distant world anyone would yearn for

a vast dreamy landscape extends ahead

a voice is in the dream, a simple laugh

if you hear it, you can imagine anything

chiisana aoi kotori wa kago no naka

te wo nobasu mado no mukou hiroi sekai wo

a small blue bird is inside a cage

yearning for the vast world outside

yumemiteita yo itsudemo kono basho kara

utsuri kawaru keshiki wa nagarete

itsu no hi ka hana wa kareyuku

dakedo mata hanasaku

every time I dream I’m in this place

as the ever changing landscape rolls by

someday these flowers will wither

but today they still bloom

mukashibanashi watashi wa yume kanae

kono sekai wo watari aruku no wa

aishiteiru kansha shiteru kimi ni

tada zutto aitakute futo kitsuke ba

once long ago I realized my dream

to walk throughout this world

I loved and was grateful to you

before I realized, I just always wanted to see you

kono michi ano hi mie nakatta michi

sono kakera nigirishimete ippou susumeba

this path, on that day I couldn’t see it

that fragment, I should’ve held on to it

omoidashita itsudemo futarikiri de

nani mo kamo ataete kureta hibi

ikiru koto yasashii kokoro

nukumori wo arigatou

I can remember we were always together

You’d grant me anything on those days

living with such a kind heart

I’m still grateful for your warmth

tabi wo tsutsukete toki wa meguri

kimitachi ga oshiete kureta koto

ikiru koto shiawase no imi

yatto wakattara

Time goes on and I’ll continue this journey

For all you’ve taught me

what it means to be happy in this life

I finally understand it

kimi ni omoi wo tsutaete kute

ato sukoshi de kimi ga iru toko he

ima hiraku saigo no tobira atarashii sekai he

I’ll convey these feelings to you

in just a bit I’ll be where you are

I’m opening the last gate to a brand new world
